title: Systems Analysis and Development
description: Degree in Systems Analysis and Development, with a focus on building and maintaining web applications. Education centered on fullstack development, with a strong foundation in programming logic, system modeling, and software quality practices. Knowledge of agile methodologies, information security, and integration with cloud services such as AWS.

title: Apache Kafka and Spring Boot (Consumer, Producer)
description: In this course, you are going to learn how to consume from an Apache Kafka topic and consume from it using a simple Spring Boot Application. This course is not for everyone, as you need basic experience with Maven, Spring Boot and Apache Kafka. This course focuses solely on practicality, thus concepts of Spring Framework or Apache Kafka will not be explained in detail, but instead a small simple project will be built.
